dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you for calling PayLine Support. This is Mike Thomson. How can I help you today?

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: I was promised a refund two weeks ago and I still haven’t received it.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I’m sorry about the delay. Let me look into that for you. May I have your ticket number?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: Thank you. I see the refund was approved but is still pending with the bank.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: That’s what I was told last week too.

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: I understand how frustrating that can be. Unfortunately, I don’t have the ability to speed up bank processing times.

dialogue.speaker: Customer
dialogue.text: So there’s nothing you can do?

dialogue.speaker: Agent
dialogue.text: At this point, the best option is to wait another 3–5 business days. I’ve added notes to your case.
